title: Crime Alert 08.05.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.05.19
description:
Cops arrest man on the run for two years on human trafficking charge. Truck driver arrested on multiple charges after leading cops on chase because he didn't want to pay toll. Man leaves toddle in hot car so he can shoplift in Walmart.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
